com.actinarium.rhythm

Class RhythmOverlayInflater.SimpleLayerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.actinarium.rhythm.SimpleArgumentsBundle
      • com.actinarium.rhythm.RhythmOverlayInflater.SimpleLayerConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArgumentsBundle, RhythmOverlayInflater.LayerConfig
    Enclosing class:
    RhythmOverlayInflater

    protected static class RhythmOverlayInflater.SimpleLayerConfig
extends SimpleArgumentsBundle
implements RhythmOverlayInflater.LayerConfig
    A simple layer config that also carries arguments. Instead of composition, extends SimpleArgumentsBundle for performance reasons (smaller memory use). Used internally in RhythmOverlayInflater and is available to its subclasses, although developers are encouraged to make their own RhythmOverlayInflater.LayerConfig implementations with SOLID principles rather than extend this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleLayerConfig

        public SimpleLayerConfig(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String layerType,
                         int indent,
                         @NonNull
                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> arguments,
                         @NonNull
                         android.util.DisplayMetrics metrics)
        Create layer config object for layer of given type, with known indent, and with pre-filled arguments bag
        Parameters:
        layerType - spec layer type, used for appropriate factory lookup
        indent - number of leading spaces in the config line, used to resolve layer hierarchy
        arguments - A collection that maps arguments to values. In this implementation both the key and the value are raw strings, parsed into required data types as requested from the map. The values must be already provided as parsable literal values — this implementation cannot resolve variables or calculate expressions.
        For performance reasons, this map will be used as is, therefore it must not be mutated. Furthermore this implementation lacks methods to put new parameters into the bag.
        metrics - Display metrics associated with this arguments bundle, required so that dimension values (dp, sp etc) can be properly resolved.
